artist: Artist: Jack Thomas Chick; Publisher: Chick Publications, Ontario, Calif.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and photomechanical illustration of a figure holding his chest printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 22 pp.

title: Heart Trouble ?
